summary: A collection of unit test modules that validate an AWS AppSync client library. The tests cover CRUD operations for GraphQL APIs and API caches, API key management, schema retrieval and creation with status checks, tag handling for resources, and server-side tag retrieval, all using Moto to mock AWS services.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and correctness of AppSync management code by automatically testing API lifecycle, security, schema deployment, and tagging functionalities, preventing regressions and supporting stable deployment of GraphQL services.
